partial_orders.reason: Both edits are part of the same refactoring within the same function (getFields) and are directly related to the same logical change. Edit 0 removes the conditional logic that set firstChar based on query conditions and hardcodes the regex patterns to use '\A'. Edit 1 comments out the conditional logic that would set fieldsSelectFrom to None based on the same query conditions that were removed in Edit 0. The variable 'query' and the conditions 'query.startswith("SELECT ") and "(SELECT " in query' are referenced in both edits' changed lines, making this a synchronized refactoring where both edits work together to remove the same conditional logic pattern. This represents a single, contiguous micro-task of simplifying the regex matching logic.
